name: 4 Windows
description:
How good are you at multitasking?

Test your skill in this difficult game.

Play 4 simple games and try to last as long as possible. The hook is, that you are going to play all of the games simultainious.

Controls:

Jumpgame: press space to jump

Squidgame: move with arrow keys

Dodgegame: move with A and D

Truckgame: change lane with shift

Source Code:

https://github.com/timmmmmb/Miz-Jam-1
